archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.2.4a: a) evaluating performance against recognised Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) scores in registers such as CVEDetails, MITRE's Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE), and NIST's National Vulnerabilities Database (NVD)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
